author: dreid
msg: This adds the start of an attempt to add autoconf magic
to the build process, with limited success so far!
This also adds the start of unit tests for the code so far
implemented - something that should continue. The current test
isn't as useful as it could be, but it does get me started!
Fix return values in the RSA extension
Start doing more checks when reading keys
Reafctor read code to make it more useful and less repetitive
The additional autoconf work is to add checks for python and
the version number detected, along with checking we have the

author: bdelacretaz
msg: SLING-114 - automated test of a complete template added

author: jonesde
msg: Applied patch from Adrian Crum in Jira OFBIZ-1442 to support a new format for localization in XML files
